Package sample

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Card
    Card class: Contains: family it belongs to (rep or dem), name of the card, description, image URL and its cost, contains also a comparator and a function that renders the card's back
    CreatureCard
    Card type: Creature.
    DeckFactory
    Reads the Jason file and produce a card out of that input.
    Main
    Main Function.
    SpellCard
    Type of card: Spell.
    State
    This class represents the State of the game at each moment: what cards are on the board, what cards are on each hand, how many attack points, health points and lives each creature/hero has, which cards are sleeping, which cards have attacked this turn, which Hero is playing...
    State.Target
    This class identifies the general idea of a Target.
    StateTest
    Test the validity of the Jason file and whether DeckFactory produced a meaningful input
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CardFamily
    Card family is either exclusively republican, or exclusively democrat or common.
    CreatureEffect
    Creature Effect can be either a Death rattle, summon or none.
    EffectTarget
    Effect target can be: targeted, random, enemy AOE, friendly AOE, all AOE, your hero, enemy hero, none.
    EffectType
    Effect target can be of type damage or heal or none.
    SpellEffect
    Spell effect can be: draw a card, damage, heal, summon or none.
    State.Hero
    The Hero is either Hillary Clinton or Donald Trump
